price: (42) And We caused to overtake them in this world a curse, and on the Day of Resurrection they will be of the despised.[1106]
arabic: وَأَتۡبَعۡنَٰهُمۡ فِي هَٰذِهِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا لَعۡنَةٗۖ وَيَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ هُم مِّنَ ٱلۡمَقۡبُوحِينَ
footnotes: [1106]- Literally, "those made hideous," who will be far removed from all good and mercy.
